name: Froyo Games
introduce: Froyo Games is a multi-chain GameFi infrastructure based on Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain. It hosts an expanding ecosystem with simple yet powerful tools that game developers and esports operators can easily integrate with minimum blockchain skills. Froyo Games also has its own product suite that anyone can use to make the best of the platform, from a GameFi launchpad, NFT marketplace, robust esports channels to a gamified social marketing platform that builds user awareness and social engagements.
